meaningMnemonic: The <radical>canopy</radical> <radical>guy</radical> is a guy who stands in the <kanji>corridor</kanji> trying to sell people canopies.
readingMnemonic: You take the <kanji>corridor</kanji>, but this time the canopy guy is gone. In his place is a new salesman. This one is trying to sell you <reading>roe</reading> (ろう).
